(4007x1+0)/1 mod 32768 = 4007. (4007x3+1)/2 mod 16384 = 6011. (4007x9+5)/4 mod 8192 = 825. (4007x27+19)/8 mod 4096 = 1238. (4007x27+19)/16 mod 2048 = 619. (4007x81+73)/32 mod 1024 = 929. (4007x243+251)/64 mod 512 = 370. (4007x243+251)/128 mod 256 = 185. (4007x729+881)/256 mod 128 = 22. (4007x729+881)/512 mod 64 = 11. (4007x2187+3155)/1024 mod 32 = 17. (4007x6561+10489)/2048 mod 16 = 10. (4007x6561+10489)/4096 mod 8 = 5. (4007x19683+35563)/8192 mod 4 = 0. (4007x19683+35563)/16384 mod 2 = 0. (4007x19683+35563)/32768 mod 1 = 0.
